entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening and ending before morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
